import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Menu, X, Shield, Radar, Database, BarChart3, Grid3x3, Search, Lock } from 'lucide-react'; import './Landing.css'; export default function Landing() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState('home'); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; const handleNavClick = (name) => { setActiveNav(name); setIsMenuOpen(false); if (name === 'features') { document.getElementById('features')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } else if (name === 'contact') { document.getElementById('contact')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } else if (name === 'login') { navigate('/login'); } else if (name === 'admin') { navigate('/admin'); } else if (name === 'home') { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); } }; const features = [ { icon: Shield, title: 'Secure Access Control', description: 'Role permissions, SSO, audit logs.' }, { icon: Radar, title: 'Real-Time Tracking', description: 'Status of firearms, radios, vehicles.' }, { icon: Database, title: 'Centralized Records', description: 'Chain-of-custody and assignments.' }, { icon: BarChart3, title: 'Reports', description: 'Compliance and readiness KPIs.' }, { icon: Grid3x3, title: 'Admin Dashboard', description: 'Manage users, stations, policies.' }, { icon: Search, title: 'Search & Filter', description: 'Locate items by tag or status.' }, ]; const overviewStats = [ { label: 'Checked-out Items', value: '148' }, { label: 'Service Due', value: '23' }, { label: 'Compliance', value: '98.2%' }, ]; return (
